keys: Qualifications de langage et de transmission
Habilidades da língua e da comunicação
Abilità di comunicazione e di linguaggio
resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81281</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81281</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4190</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Using a Dictionary</string>
            <string language="es">Utilización de un diccionario</string>
            <string language="ga">Foclóir a Úsáid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verwenden eines Verzeichnisses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Utilisation d'un dictionnaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usando um dicionário</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usando un dizionario</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρησιμοποίηση ενός λεξικού</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This language and communications skills resource is concerned with the use of a dictionary to look up the meaning of words and compare synonyms. It is suitable for pupils who are in the following categories - educationally/socially disadvantaged, learning difficulties, dyslexia, refugees, specific learning disabilities, hearing impairment,</string>
            <string language="es">Este recurso de habilidades lingüísticas y de comunicación se ocupa del uso de un diccionario para buscar el significado de las palabras y comparar sinónimos. Es adecuado para alumnos que estén en las siguientes categorías: educacional/socialmente en desv</string>
            <string language="ga">Baineann an acmhainn scileanna teanga agus cumarsáide seo le húsáid an fhoclóra chun míniú focal a chuardach san fhoclóir agus chun comhchiallaigh a chur i gcomparáid lena chéile. Tá sé feiliúnach do dhaltaí atá sna catagóir seo a leanas – faoi mhíbhuntái</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Language and Communication Skills</string>
            <string language="es">Habilidades lingüísticas y de comunicación</string>
            <string language="ga">Scileanna Teanga agus Cumarsáide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Advice Sheet</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja de consejos</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Sprache und Kommunikationen Fähigkeiten 
Hilfsmittel wird mit dem Gebrauch eines Verzeichnisses, die Bedeutung 
von Wörtern oben zu schauen und Synonyme zu vergleichen betroffen. 
Es ist für Schüler verwendbar, die in den folgenden Kategorien
- benachteiligtes educationally/socially, erlernenschwierigkeiten, 
dyslexia, Flüchtlinge, spezifische erlernenunfähigkeit, Hörschaden 
sind,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces langage et ressource de qualifications de 
transmissions est concerné par l'utilisation d'un dictionnaire de 
rechercher la signification des mots et de comparer des synonymes. 
Il convient aux élèves qui sont dans les catégories suivantes
- educationally/socially désavantagé, difficultés d'étude, 
dyslexie, réfugiés, incapacités d'étude spécifiques, 
affaiblissement d'audition,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes língua e recurso das habilidades das 
comunicações são concernidos com o uso de um dicionário olhar 
acima o meaning das palavras e comparar synonyms. É apropriado 
para os alunos que estão nas seguintes categorias - 
educationally/socially prejudicado, dificuldades de aprendizagem, 
dyslexia, refugees, inabilidades de aprendizagem específicas, 
impairment de hearing,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi linguaggio e risorsa di abilità di 
comunicazioni è interessato dell'uso di un dizionario osservare in su
il significato delle parole e confrontare i sinonimi. È adatto 
ad allievi che sono nelle seguenti categorie - educationally/socially 
danneggiato, difficoltà imparanti, dyslexia, rifugiati, inabilità 
imparanti specifiche, l'indebolimento dell'udito,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα γλώσσα και στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς δεξιοτήτων 
επικοινωνιών ενδιαφέρονται για τη χρήση ενός λεξικού για να 
ανατρέξουν η έννοια των λέξεων και να συγκρίνουν τα συνώνυμα. 
Είναι κατάλληλο για τους μαθητές που είναι στις ακόλουθες 
κατηγορίες - εκπαιδευτικά/κοινωνικά μειονεκτούν, μαθησιακές 
δυσκολίες, δυσλεξία, πρόσφυγες, συγκεκριμένες μαθησιακές 
δυσκολίες, εξασθένιση ακρόασης,</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprachen- und Kommunikation Fähigkeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rateblatt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Qualifications de langage et de transmission</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Feuille de conseil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Habilidades da língua e da comunicação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha Do Conselho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Abilità di comunicazione e di linguaggio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio Di Consiglio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεξιότητες γλώσσας και επικοινωνίας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο συμβουλών</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
